price: Wọ́n ṣèèmọ̀ pé olùkìlọ̀ kan nínú wọn wá bá wọn. Àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́ sì wí pé: “Èyí ni òpìdán, òpùrọ́.”
arabic: وَعَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡۖ وَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waʿajibū an jāahum mundhirun min'hum waqāla al-kāfirūna hādhā sāḥirun kadhābun
